visualization.name: Multiple Sequence Alignment and Sequence Logo
visualization.help:
# What is Multiple Sequence Alignment and Sequence Logo?
This tool provides an **interactive multiple sequence alignment (MSA) viewer** powered by **Alignment Viewer 2.0**. It is designed for high performance, enabling visualization and analysis of very large alignments directly in the browser.
## Key Features
- **Scalable Visualization**: View entire alignments or zoom in to individual residues. - **Sequence Types**: Supports DNA, RNA, and protein alignments in FASTA or Stockholm format. - **Analysis Tools**: Displays sequence logos, consensus sequences, conservation, and gap statistics.
Learn more at: [https://github.com/sanderlab/AlignmentViewer2.0](https://github.com/sanderlab/AlignmentViewer2.0)
